snippet.title: Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective Promotional Video
snippet.description:
Official Site: https://www.capcom-games.com/ghosttrick/

Relive the cult classic mystery-solving adventure like never before! Experience Ghost Trick all over again in the long-awaited remaster – by Director Shu Takumi,  creator of the Ace Attorney series.
---
Ghost Trick: Phantom Detective
Platforms: Nintendo Switch,  PlayStation4,  Xbox One,  Steam
Release Date: Summer 2023
Genre: Mystery
No. of Players: 1
ESRB Rating: T - Violence
